Description:
Detects the execution of a Sysinternals Tool via the creation of the "accepteula" registry key

Author: Markus Neis
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - Sysinternal Tool Execution - Registry
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where event_type = 'createkey' and target_object like '%\eulaaccepted'
